name: Nano Blitz(play test)
description:
Controls

LeftShift - Accelerate

LeftClick  - Rally Allies/Focus Target (White ships are yours but they will turn blue and become rallied when you left click around them. Rallied ships will attempt to follow you and focus on the target nearest your mouse when you hold left click.)

RightClick - Fire Missile

Scroll - Camera Zoom

Description

Slither.io meets RTS. In it's current state I'd like to share what I've been working on as well as get some ideas to where I could take it. With the recent addition of a color grid, I'm considering making the win condition of having the most of the grid in your color. Let me know what fun ideas come to you!

This is my first game!
